holidays.title: World AIDS Day
holidays.description: A day for spreading awareness of the AIDS pandemic spread by the spread of HIV infection.

holidays.title: Bifocals at the Monitor Liberation Day
holidays.description: Working on the computer can be quite the hassle for people wearing bifocals.

holidays.title: Central African Republic Republic Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Republic Day in the Central African Republic by exploring the country’s heritage and culture.

holidays.title: Commemoration Day
holidays.description: Get ready to honor the fallen heroes who served their country this Commemoration Day.

holidays.title: Day Without Art Day
holidays.description: Wear your red ribbon in solidarity with the AIDS community on Day Without Art.

holidays.title: Eat a Red Apple Day
holidays.description: Honor our teachers’ favorite desk decor and our doctor’s best time-honored remedy.

holidays.title: Freedom and Democracy Day in Chad
holidays.description: It’s Freedom and Democracy Day in Chad, which marks the rise of President Idriss Déby.

holidays.title: Indigenous Faith Day in Arunachal Pradesh
holidays.description: Celebrate Indigenous Faith Day in Arunachal Pradesh to protect indigenous faith and identity.

holidays.title: Kazakhstan’s First President's Day
holidays.description: Learn the reason behind the television broadcast and the fireworks in the capital of Kazakhstan today.

holidays.title: National Cookie Cutter Day
holidays.description: Get your cookie cutters out and let us prepare some tasty treats!

holidays.title: National Package Protection Day
holidays.description: You can protect your package during transit and ensure that it reaches you safely and on time.

holidays.title: National Women Support Women Day
holidays.description: Join women worldwide and stand up for the rights and well-being of girls and women.

holidays.title: Portugal Independence Day
holidays.description: Portugal’s parliamentary democracy has continued to thrive since 1640.

holidays.title: Portugal Restoration of Independence Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the day Portugal regained its independence, a successful revolution against the rule of Spain.

holidays.title: Prisoners for Peace Day
holidays.description: Preserve the peace and help us bring these brave prisoners to freedom.

holidays.title: Rockefeller Center Christmas Tree Lighting
holidays.description: The Rockefeller Center Christmas Tree Lighting ceremony draws 750,000 tourists to New York.

holidays.title: Romania Independence Day
holidays.description: Here’s some little-known information about Romanians as we celebrate their big day.

holidays.title: Romania National Day
holidays.description: Understand the history behind modern-day Romania and the now unified parts of Transylvania, Bessarabia, and Bukovina.

holidays.title: Rosa Parks Day
holidays.description: Remembering “The Mother of the Civil Rights Movement” and the iconic event that gave her recognition.

holidays.title: State Inauguration Day in Nagaland
holidays.description: Get all the information you need to commemorate State Inauguration Day in Nagaland.

holidays.title: Bette Midler’s Birthday
holidays.description: Bette Midler is one of the most successful and well-paid figures in the entertainment industry.

holidays.title: Corinna Kopf’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meet the social media influencer, content creator, and star of David Dobrik’s vlog squad.

holidays.title: Dianna Williams’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented and famous dancer started dancing at the age of four!

holidays.title: Drakeo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Even after his passing, Drakeo remained one of the most impactful rappers of this generation.

holidays.title: Janelle Monae’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about this famous singer who is in love with tuxedos!

holidays.title: Javier Báez’s Birthday
holidays.description: This exceptional major league baseball player has earned every bit of his success!

holidays.title: Jen Psaki’s Birthday
holidays.description: This American political advisor is also a brilliant swimmer and an excellent mother!

holidays.title: Natalie Noel’s Birthday
holidays.description: Natalie Noel grew from being an executive assistant to being a widely influential Instagram celebrity.

holidays.title: Nicholas James Muscarella’s Birthday
holidays.description: We’re celebrating the actor who plays Office Lewis in “The Haves and the Have Nots.”

holidays.title: Philip DeFranco’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are celebrating the content creator who is one of the pioneers of YouTube.

holidays.title: Richard Pryor’s Birthday
holidays.description: This ace comedian can rest knowing he provided the blueprint for comic artists today!

holidays.title: Salva Dut’s Birthday
holidays.description: This outstanding activist led 1,500 lost boys to safety across hundreds of deserts!

holidays.title: Sarah Silverman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sarah Silverman’s politically incorrect humor launched her show to great renown and popularity!

holidays.title: Tyler Joseph’s Birthday
holidays.description: Despite writing dark, brooding songs, Tyler Joseph has a quirky and colorful persona!

holidays.title: Zoë Kravitz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kravitz has managed to follow in her parent's footsteps by becoming a musician and an actress.
